column4: Two SolarCity board members will consider Tesla deal
column5: LOS ANGELES Solar panel maker SolarCity Corp  said on Monday it has formed a special committee of just two directors to evaluate Tesla Motors Inc's  $2.8 billion takeover offer.

column4: UPDATE 1-Two SolarCity board members will consider Tesla deal
column5: LOS ANGELES  June 27 Solar panel maker SolarCity Corp said on Monday it has formed a special committee of just two directors to evaluate Tesla Motors Inc's  $2.8 billion takeover offer.

column4: BRIEF-Solarcity forms special committee to evaluate Tesla proposal
column5: * Solarcity announces formation of special committee to evaluate Tesla proposal

column4: SolarCity forms special committee to evaluate Tesla offer
